quote: Bitterness is like cancer. It eats upon the host. But anger is like fire. It burns it all clean.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: We can shoot rockets into space but we can't cure anger or discontent.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: He's right. It's cruel to give hope where none should be. It only turns into disappointment, resentment, rage, all the things that make this life more difficult than it already is.
author: Victoria Aveyard

quote: I saw clearly that so long as I was still a human being and not nothingness, I was alive and so could suffer, be angry and feel shame at my actions.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: I am angry nearly every day of my life.
author: Louisa May Alcott
